content:
EmitTypeInformation Enum

Definition

Specifies how often to emit type information.

In this Article

public enum EmitTypeInformation
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
EmitTypeInformation

Fields

Always

Always to emit type information.
AsNeeded

As needed emit type information.
Never

Never to emit type information.
